game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A first-person audio game, telling the tale of a blind yet gifted hero. Make your way through a 3D environment without receiving any visual cues. Put all your faith in your ears and help our hero in his quest to uncover the sinister secrets of these twisty uranium mines, which he calls his home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A first-person audio game, telling the tale of a blind yet gifted hero. Make your way through a 3D environment without receiving any visual cues.
